content: तुला [तुल्-भिदा°अङ्] {@--1@} A balance or the beam of a balance; तुलया धृ to hold in a balance, to weigh, consider equal; अश्वमेधसहस्राणि सत्यं च तुलया धृतं <ls>H. 4. 131.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--2@} A measure, weight. {@--3@} Weighing. {@--4@} Resemblance, likeness, equality, similarity (with <ab>gen.</ab>, <ab>instr.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); किं धूर्जटेरिव तुलामुपयाति संख्ये <ls>Ve. 3. 8</ls>; तुलां यदाराहेति दंतवाससा <ls>Ku. 5. 34</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 15</ls>; सद्यः परस्परतुलामधिरोहतां द्वे <ls>R. 5. 68</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 8</ls>, <ls n="R. 19.">50.</ls> {@--5@} Libra, the seventh sign of the zodiac; जयति तुलामधिरूढो भास्वानपि जलदपटलानि <ls>Pt. 1. 330.</ls> {@--6@} A sloping beam or timber in the roof of a house. {@--7@} A measure of gold or silver equal to 100 {%palas%}.
